0.0.3.en: Add triggers when RuuviTag enters/leaves,  fixed bug with acceleratio with RAWv1

0.0.2.en: Add app settings, acceleration capability, icons

0.0.4.en: Fixed pressure unit, updated trigger title

0.0.5.en: Add API for Ruuvi Station gateway

0.0.6.en: Add preference to show / hide notification messages

0.1.0.en: Add reset in sequence number detection : low bat warning

0.2.4.en: custom timeout for BLE discovery removed in Homey v6.0.0

0.2.5.en: Fix when no data receveid in BLE adv

0.3.1.en: First version with gateway support (WIP), ruuvipro improvments, trigger fix

0.3.5.en: Detects if hostname ends with .local in gateway autodiscovery

0.3.6.en: Detects if hostname ends with .local in gateway autodiscovery (fixes)

0.3.8.en: Fixed bug when adding a new RuuviTag

0.4.0.en: Add support for Ruuvi Air (formats 6 and E1)

0.4.2.en: Fix readSequenceNumber for format 6, add test suite
